verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> in my complaint. <S%H7879><s%> Preserve <S%H5341><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> from fear <S%H6343><s%> of the enemy. <S%H341><s%>
Hide <S%H5641><s%> me from the conspiracy <S%H5475><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7489><s%> from the noisy <S%H7285><s%> crowd of the ones doing <S%H6466><s%> evil; <S%H205><s%>
who sharpen <S%H8150><s%> their tongue <S%H3956><s%> like a sword, <S%H2719><s%> and aim <S%H1869><s%> their arrows, <S%H2671><s%> deadly <S%H4751><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%>
to shoot <S%H3384><s%> innocent <S%H8535><s%> men from ambushes. <S%H4565><s%> They shoot <S%H3384><s%> at him suddenly <S%H6597><s%> and fearlessly. <S%H3372><s%>

They encourage <S%H2388><s%> themselves in evil <S%H7451><s%> plans. <S%H1697><s%> They talk <S%H5608><s%> about laying <S%H2934><s%> snares <S%H4170><s%> secretly. <S%H2934><s%> They say, <S%H559><s%> "Who will see them? <S%H7200><s%>"

They plot <S%H2664><s%> injustice, <S%H5766><s%> saying, <S%H8552><s%> "We have made a perfect <S%H2664><s%> plan! <S%H2665><s%>" Surely man <S%H376><s%>'s mind <S%H7130><s%> and heart <S%H7130><s%> are cunning. <S%H6013><s%>
But God <S%H430><s%> will shoot <S%H3384><s%> at them. <S%H6597><s%> They will be suddenly struck <S%H4347><s%> down with an arrow. <S%H2671><s%>
Their own tongues <S%H3956><s%> shall ruin <S%H3782><s%> them. <S%H7200><s%> All who see them will shake their heads. <S%H5074><s%>

All mankind <S%H120><s%> shall be afraid. <S%H3372><s%> They shall declare <S%H5046><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and shall wisely ponder <S%H7919><s%> what he has done. <S%H4639><s%>

The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and shall take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in him. <S%H3477><s%> All the upright in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall praise him! <S%H1984><s%>
